#  Scientific Council -- Space Technology Centre 

URL: https://www.ctk.agh.edu.pl/en/about/scientific-council
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:25:07

Skip to content

Skip to footer

 Scientific Council 

The Scientific Council of the Space Technology Centre AGH University of Krakow is an 
initiating
 and 
advisory
 body of the Centre.

Members of the Council are appointed by the 
Rector
. The Council is composed of AGH employees and authorized representatives of other research and industrial units, both national and international.

The Council is authorized to take a position in all matters concerning the Space Technology Centre, and its tasks include, among others, determining the directions of research, development and implementation activities of the Centre.
